alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 2:14PM MDT until April 01 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with occasionally gusts up 60 mph in the foothills. Mountain gusts 60 to 75 mph possible, especially along Wyoming Highway 28 at Red Canyon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest potential for high wind in Lander and at Red Canyon is late Saturday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Use caution if driving. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
